description.value: The Endeca monitor will capture information about the health and performance of the Endeca server.

property.label: URL
property.description: This property is deprecated and thus hidden. Old description: The full URL to connect to in the format protocol://host:port/path Protocol has to be http or https, the port can be omitted for the respective default port.

property.label: Protocol
property.description: Select the protocol that will be used to establish the connection. If 'https' is selected, a secure connection will be made using SSL.

property.label: Port
property.description: Enter the port number of the webserver. The default HTTP port is 80.

property.label: Path
property.description: Enter the path to the webpage to be monitored. Example: /index.html

property.label: HTTP version
property.description: The version of the HTTP protocol. HTTP/1.1 is the recommended.

metric.description: If the host is reachable, the measure will yield 1, otherwise 0.
metric.name: HostReachable

metric.description: The amount of time that has elapsed since the Endeca Index has been last updated
metric.name: TimeSinceLastIndexUpdate
NumOfRequests
metric.description: Number of requests to Endeca during the monitered interval

description.value: Provides the ability to pull in performance measures for the Endeca Index server(s)
